post.text: At the #VPDebate, Mike Pence tried really, really hard to deny pretty much everything Donald Trump has said and done. Let's replay the tape:

comment.author: Robert
comment.text: Gist of the debate: Tim Kaine: "Then why did [Trump] say that? How can you defend that? Mike Pence: *stutters unintelligibly*

replies.author: Amanda
replies.text: Nope. Pence: giving answer. Kaine: yelling over him like a childish bully

replies.author: Robert
replies.text: Oh so Pence is a childish bully for talking over someone? So are you saying Trump is a childish bully for talking over Hillary in the first debate Amanda ????? ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚

replies.author: Amanda
replies.text: Robert C read correctly. I said Kaine is a childish bully.

replies.author: Robert
replies.text: Is trump a childish bully Amanda ? YES OR NO.
